entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:03 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: N 46 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
